data.name: Sample - VMware Carbon Black EDR - 2.0.2
data.description: VMware Carbon Black EDR is purpose-built for enterprise SOC and IR teams.This connector facilitates automated operation related to endpoint protection like isolate endpoint, unisolate endpoint, hunt file, terminate process etc. with VMware Carbon Black EDR server.

workflows.description: Retrieves details about all sensors (endpoints) or specific sensor(s) from the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Sensor(s) Information

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Get Sensor(s) Information

workflows.description: Isolates sensor(s) on the VMware Carbon Black EDR based on Hostname, IP Address, Process Name or Filehash(MD5) you have specified.
workflows.name: Isolate Sensor

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Isolate Sensor

workflows.description: Removes isolation on sensor(s) from the VMware Carbon Black EDR based on Hostname, IP Address, Process Name or Filehash(MD5) you have specified.
workflows.name: Remove Isolation

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Remove Isolation

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all running processes along with its details from the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the sensor details you have specified.
workflows.name: Get All Processes

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Get All Processes

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of connections for a specific sensor and process from the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the sensor and process details you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Process Connections

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Get Process Connections

workflows.description: Terminates a process running on an endpoint on the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the sensor and process details you have specified.
workflows.name: Terminate Process

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Terminate Process

workflows.description: Retrieves information about a file from the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the filehash you have specified.
workflows.name: Get File Information

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Get File Information

workflows.description: Hunts for a file and retrieves details for that file from the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the file type and filehash you have specified.
workflows.name: Hunt file

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Hunt file

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all blacklisted filehashes and their details from the VMware Carbon Black EDR.
workflows.name: Get All Block Hashes

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Get All Block Hashes

workflows.description: Blocks a particular file on the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the filehash (MD5 only) you have specified.
workflows.name: Block Hash

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Block Hash

workflows.description: Unblocks a particular file on the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the filehash (MD5 only) you have specified.
workflows.name: Unblock Hash

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Unblock Hash

workflows.description: Deletes a particular file from the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the sensor details and file path you have specified.
workflows.name: Delete file

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Delete file

workflows.description: Runs a search query on the endpoint to retrieve the information of binary or process from the VMware Carbon Black EDR.
workflows.name: Run Query

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Run Query

workflows.description: Searches for alerts on the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the search query you have specified.
workflows.name: Search Alerts

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Search Alerts

workflows.description: Updates the status of an alert on the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Update Alert

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Update Alert

workflows.description: Updates the status of multiple alerts on the VMware Carbon Black EDR, based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Bulk Update Alerts

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Bulk Update Alerts

workflows.description: Retrieves a list along with its details for all watchlists or specific watchlist (if you have specified the watchlist ID) from the VMware Carbon Black EDR.
workflows.name: Get Watchlist

arguments.title: VMware Carbon Black EDR: Get Watchlist
